name: World Zombie Survival FPS - Free version mobile
name_original: World Zombie Survival FPS - Free version mobile
description:
Hi, thanks for visiting my itch.io page, if you like the game or the content I make, you can download my game or give a comment, I will be very grateful. The game is free therefore you can play it without problems I will not force you to donate but if you like my content and want to donate you will motivate me to improve the games I make and give them a better quality, thank you very much for reading this The truth is that I have not won much money with video games has gone very bad for me and I'm about to give up being a young developer my parents don't like me to develop video games so if they want to give me a contribution I'll be too happy

Zombie Survival shooter is a game with high graphics in which you will have to eliminate the zombies to avoid an apocalyptic war in the world for this you will have to travel to certain parts of the world to save cities, towns and territories. The locations that you can find in this great survival game are the Sahara desert, Russian wineries, American towns, Nordic towns and Eastern Europe. In each of these locations you will have to create a differentiation strategy and that the environment such as houses, setting, furniture, etc. they can play against you. In this game you will be able to find different kinds of zombies such as the citizen zombie, the police zombie and the radioactive zombie which will have different speed, damage and life.

 

In this world you will only have one spider with which you will have to defend yourself so be very careful
